title: Commentary on Chapter 27 of Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig
description: There is a reiteration of some themes we've seen already, but this chapter sort of ties them together again in another narrative example, which Pirsig tends to do (makes sense).  Nature of Sanity, Rigel as Social Rep, the Giant
